page.title: 06Balmoral Estate
page.content: Balmoral Castle and Estate were purchased by Queen Victoria in 1852. Since that time members of the Royal Family have improved and cared for this vast Estate of natural beauty. The grounds surrounding the Castle are open to the public from 1st May to 31st July each year. Visitors are welcome to walk the paths around the Royal Home. They may visit the beautifully laid out gardens and the conservatory. They may wander the policies inspecting statues, monuments or visit the ballroom in the Castle itself or see round the stable yard and shop. The estate itself extends for just over 50,000 acres including heather clad hills used for shooting game, forestry and farm lands on the lower ground. I am fortunate to live on Balmoral Estate because my parents work for the household.
